title: WiFi Map Pro 3.2.0 APK #Networks #Tools
text:
Downloads 
1.2 M If you are one of those people who always ask for the Wi-Fi password whenever you walk into a bar, restaurant, hotel, or friend's house, then WiFi Map Pro is an app you should install on your device, and never delete. With it you can connect to the Internet no matter where you are, thanks to the social network it includes. This application grows every day thanks to the activity of thousands of users dedicated to including the passwords of the locations they have been to. Thus any network, public or private, might appear on WiFi Map Pro. Besides the password, users commonly leave comments on the network's stability, or directions on how to connect to it. You can load the Wi-Fi passwords database for cities all over the world, which is really helpful when you travel abroad and don't want to pay for extra data. No matter where you are, you can add connection points for any location, including public networks with or without passwords. You can also update the ones already in the app. With thousand of access points in cities around the world, WiFi Map Pro is a practical tool you can use to connect to the Internet. In the most populated cities, you practically can't take a step without having a network to connect to. Five original apps for your travels 
Next Tuesday, September 27, is World Tourism Day. By this point we certainly don't need to evangelize about the benefits of an intelligent use of your smartphone when traveling, whether you're making reservations or getting your bearings in a new city. So in the spirit of the hour, we've put together a few Android travel apps that are a bit different from the usual ones â€“ but still equally practical.
